Title: Eega
Writer: Ashwin Gangaraju (associate head writer), S.S. Kanchi (story treatment), Janardhan Maharshi (dialogue), Crazy Mohan (dialogue), Vijayendra Prasad (ideas of), S.S. Rajamouli (story & screenplay), S.S. Rajamouli
Actors: Sudeep, Nani, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Hamsa Nandini
Plot: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.
Language: Telugu, Tamil, Hindi, Malayalam, Chinese, Urdu, Thai, Japanese, Portuguese
